backend/main.mo: Contains an actor with a buildNotification function that always asserts false, indicating it should never be called.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend features, their affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all main frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/styles defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global background/foreground application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with BrandProvider and CartProvider.
frontend/src/cart/CartProvider.tsx: Implements a cart context with add, remove, update, clear operations and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with route links and a cart badge showing item count.
frontend/src/components/BrandProvider.ts: Brand context storing brand name and logo URL with localStorage and a fallback default logo.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with logo upload, editable brand name, mobile menu toggle, and fallback to default logo on error.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product with image, price, optional quantity controls, and add‑to‑cart handling.
Carousel component that horizontally scrolls through ProductCard items with left and right buttons and optional quantity controls.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines the Product interface and exports arrays of thepla and other product data along with category labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status management via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables, themes, fonts, and scroll-hiding utilities for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, wrapping the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Account page showing a guest profile and navigation links for contact, FAQ, and upcoming features.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Cart page that displays cart items with quantity controls, removal options, and an empty cart fallback.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Displays product categories using theplas and other products, each rendered in a ProductCarousel.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page with phone, location, email, and Instagram inputs using React state and styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Displays an FAQ list with expandable items managed by component state.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero section, brand story, and a Buy Now button that adds a default product to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows a list of static notifications with icons and timestamps, falling back to an empty-state message if none exist.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for container queries and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including feature requests, branding tasks, and project configuration state.
